main.name: Mark Lin
main.description: I am a 2B Honours Mathematics Student, majoring in Statistics at the University of Waterloo. Find out more about me below
main.bio: I love music, reading and (obviously) coding. I excel at front-end frameworks like React.js and Angular.js and have back-end experience with SQL, GraphQL, Firebase and Java/Scala. The main reason I love software development so much, is because of the reward I feel after creating a project and solving any problems that arise.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

education.description: Part of the co-op program offered at the University of Waterloo. I am currently looking for an opportunity for my third co-op term.

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: Worked on the Transparency Trader team, and helped develop and manage a FO risk management tool for fixed income and FX. Worked with Angular and Scala to create multiple support tools which fetch data and provides it to the user either in browser or in an excel document. I also increased performance on all projects by identifying hardware issues through Java scripts that parsed data from log files.

work.title: Software Developer
work.description: Created a dynamic and responsive web application using Typescript, React.js, Next.js and Firebase and helped architect and engineer the backend.

work.title: Software Developer Intern
work.description: Created an optimized smart contract on the Ethereum blockchain using Solidity and Node.js.

projects.title: Resume Website
projects.category: A React based resume website template
